comment._content: LOC -- check your spelling; Pasteur, not Pastuer.

comment._content: Richard Arthur Norton and Wystan: Thanks for the additional information and correction.  We'll fix the source data next time we update the record.

comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content: I turned mirror view the date scratched on left lower corner, seems most likely 1/15/93 (71 years old), although in this picture looks a man in his middle 60's.  That would make 1/15/83 when Dr. Pasteur was 61?   There's a picture he is wearing a bonnet, looking much older. I wonder if George Grantham Bain, obtained the negative 18 years beyond Pasteur's death and scratched it 9/10/13.
